reviews.review: This game is BRILLIANT. With the most innovative and unique mechanics I've ever seen in a game, the perfect atmosphere, devious puzzles, and our favorite robot narrator GlaDOS, it's basically the game that every game designer wishes they could top. Good job, Valve!
Classic. Great game for a cheap price.

Are you, like me, 15 years late to the party?
Well, the reviews ain't wrong. 98% and overwhelmingly positive!
Just buy it. I got the Portal Bundle on sale for less than the price of a happy meal.

This game has been one of the best 5 hours of my life, its honestly an instant classic, the puzzles are so fun, and it doesn't feel repetitive either, the game manages to take one concept, and expands on it, really pushes it to its limits, i love the humor in this game, it manages to spice things up even more

It definitely makes me feel old to call this game a classic, but that is for sure what it has become. The game itself is very straight-forward but a delight to play from start to finish.
good game, no lemons tho unfortunately :(

Man, I don't remember this game being so short (Don't know why is says I've only played for 0.9 hours when I played for about 2)

I played through this game so many times on Xbox 360 10+ years ago, doing all the popular glitches, trying to speedrun the game, doing the time trial mode (even though I've never been the speedrunning type) and just replaying it because I had nothing else to play because I was a kid and we were poor so I didn't have much else to play anyways

Playing this game again brought on a lot of nostalgia and I even found some ways to beat some test chambers I didn't know about plus it's just a fun 'beat it in an evening' kind of game with a great story to go with it that ties in to Half-Life (No spoilers for the younger people who haven't played this yet, even if it is a 15 year old game)

Well worth $10 for 2-3 hours of fun puzzles and entertaining dialog from one of gamings most iconic characters ever.

8/10

Геймплей состоит из разнообразных головоломок, нам придётся, думать, скакать, думать, прыгать, думать, уворачиваться, думать и еще раз думать. Чтобы пройти особенно сложные комнаты с головоломками, нам надо помнить универсальное правило порталов: "Что быстро влетит, то быстро вылетит". Отсюда следует, что при пересечения портала на вас будут действовать различные законы физики как например инерция, сила тяжести и т. д (лень перечислять, плюс больше законов не знаю). Так что чтобы пройти надо будет думать как правильно, под каким углом и с какой скоростью лучше запрыгнуть в него, а так думать напрягает по статистике 99% людей, в этом и фишка игры, что она в некоторых местах сложная, и реально заставляет задуматься человека о смысле бытия всего мира. В общем, отличная игра сыграйте, не пожалеете.

Me esperaba un juego de mas historia por lo que la verdad cuando lo termine quede bastante sorprendida, pero no de una manera negativa. Los  puzzles son ingeniosos y el juego en si es bastante entretenido. Aun asi, lo unico negativo que tengo para decir es que sigo esperando mi tarta.
After finally playing a full play-through, I now realize that I've waited far too long to enjoy this game. Well done. Frustrating at times, but always satisfying. It's surprisingly funny as well.
